mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.username as username ,a.password as password ,a.renshi_name as renshiName ,a.renshi_phone as renshiPhone ,a.renshi_id_number as renshiIdNumber ,a.renshi_photo as renshiPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.renshi_email as renshiEmail ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM renshi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.username like CONCAT('%',#{params.username},'%')
and a.password like CONCAT('%',#{params.password},'%')
and a.renshi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.renshiName},'%')
and a.renshi_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.renshiPhone},'%')
and a.renshi_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.renshiIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.renshi_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.renshiEmail},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
